title: ~speedx~
author: ~speedx~
content: Does there have any good tools like this that can be use for converting speech to text in Computer Browser. Generally when we are typing on forum or computer browser it takes a lot of time, for this I want you to have a good software where typing can be done from the Speech.and my priority language is English , BanglaÂ  Thanks in Advance

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Probably this question on this section is something off topic...By the way.... you can use "Dragon" as a professional software that allow user to type on laptop just using the voice. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dragon_NaturallySpeakingCheaper solution, use google translate ! there is a microphone option  you can just speak and it write a text !

comments.author: Crypto Library
comments.body: If you do a little google search you will find it there easily. Whatever, you can use https://www.speechtexter.com/ for this. I am using this for a long time.And for converting speech to text In my personal view it was best. It properly converts many types of languages easily from speech to text and it's support more than 70 language for using. You can use it if you want.

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: Quote from: ~speedx~ on February 09, 2023, 08:45:25 PMDoes there have any good tools like this that can be use for converting speech to text in Computer Browser. Generally when we are typing on forum or computer browser it takes a lot of time, for this I want you to have a good software where typing can be done from the Speech.I don't know if you think speaking and have it written by some software is much easier. I ha e tried it a few times on Google translate and even with English being the official language in my nation, am always left with repetition and editing of speeches. That's more time wasting than you can get by typing it out. Type more often or frequent and your hands would adapt quickly to your keys to pick just the alphabets or words you need.Instead of looking out for some easy speak and get written app, you should do more of typing, it exercises your digits and a lot more calm as well.

comments.author: drwhobox
comments.body: Although I found those speech to text software's not useful for me, as I am comfortable typing on the keyboard and these are also time-consuming while optimizing the text because those softwares don't work perfectly all the time. Also, It is a bad practice for anyone to use them for forum posting, but here is a link for an extension you can use a chrome extension: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/voice-to-text/jdcdafhjjjfnkoeilnjmnadadaoehgdc?hl=en

comments.author: UchihaSarada
comments.body: I don't know where are sources of speech you want to get text / transcript?If you want it from Youtube videos, you can click on Show Transcript and Copy the text of transcript from the right side, then Paste it to use.How to get the transcript of a Youtube video. You can use extensions too but I don't choose extensions if I can get it directly with Youtube.Transcribe Audio to text with Veed.io.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: There is 1 tool for using speech for texting that I have used before. Google Docs Voice Typing all you have to do is have a Gmail email account for it.There are more then 100 voice commands that you can use. It is easy to use and free https://support.google.com/docs/answer/4492226?hl=en
